summary: This document is an email auto-reply notification from an individual at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, indicating they will be out of the office from August 5-9, 2019, and listing various operational issues and maintenance tasks at the facility. The email was sent on August 9, 2019, which was the day Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell at MCC New York.

events.title: Email sent regarding MCC operational issues
events.description: An email was sent from an MCC New York staff member's out-of-office notification listing various maintenance and operational issues at the facility, including inoperable doors and phones.

locations.name: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York
locations.context: Federal detention facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held

keyFacts: This email was sent on August 9, 2019 - the same day Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell at MCC New York.
The document lists various operational issues at MCC New York including inoperable doors and phones in the custody unit.
The email indicates staff were out of the office during the week of Epstein's death, potentially affecting staffing levels.
The document originates from the U.S. Department of Justice facility where Epstein died.
The timing of this operational email coincides with the day of Epstein's death, though it does not directly reference the incident.
